metadata.description: Enter TenantId (DirectoryId)
Enter subscriptionId
Enter Resource group name, if the name not exists then new resource group with this name will be created
Enter location (ex.,eastus2), if you leave empty location will be default to eastus2
Enter App name (ex.,aksvchub01), leave empty if you want to create a App name as resource group name
Enter StorageAccount name, leave empty if you want to create a Storage Account as App name
Do you want to create Azure AD app (y/n)?
Do you want to create WebApp (y/n)?
Do you want to create strorage (y/n)?
Do you wanto create KeyVault (y/n)?
Enter KeyVault name, leave empty if you want to create a key vault as App name
Enter AAD App name, leave empty if you want to create a aadApp as App name
Enter Local App Directory, leave empty if you want to upload the files later
Enter email address to set alert notification, leave empty if you do not want to set alert notification
Do you want to create App Gateway (y/n)
Enter full path to pfx file to configure app gateway secure frontend
Enter fqdn for the web app backend pool(ex., prod.onakumina.com)
Address prefix for the Virtual Network(ex., 10.10.0.0/16)
Subnet prefix CIDR(ex., 10.10.0.0/24)
Do you want to create Redis Cache (y/n)?
Enter Redis Service name, leave empty if you want to create a Redis Service as App name
Do you want to create Traffic Manager (y/n)
Do you want to create create Akumina Content Distribution App  (y/n)?
Enter Function App name
Enter Content Distribution Queue binding ConnectionName
Enter Distribution Queue Name
Enter AppManager content distribution Url
Enter AppManager Query Key
Do you wanto enable http 2.0  (y/n)?
Do you wanto upload content distribution app files using FTP (y/n)?
Do you want to create services for activity stream (y/n)?
Do you want to create Cosmos DB (y/n)?
Enter database account name
Enter database name
Enter Activity Stream Queues
Enter Activity Stream Function App Name
Enter Activity Stream Function App Download Url
Enter Azure service contributor clientId  for ActivityStream Azure resource
Enter Azure service contributor secret for ActivityStream Azure resource
Enter Azure service blob-container name for ActivityStream Azure resource
Enter Azure service location for ActivityStream Azure resource
Enter Azure service resource group for ActivityStream Azure resource
Enter Azure service subscription Id for ActivityStream Azure resource
Enter Azure service tenant Id for ActivityStream Azure resource for ActivityStream Azure resource
